entry.title: Zen Bloks® XL Gel Seat Cushion – Extra Thick Open Grid Cushion for All-Day Sitting
entry.summary:
Vendor: ZenBloks
Type: TPE Gel Seat Cushion
Price: 49.95

Zen Bloks® XL Gel Seat Cushion — Extra Thick 20" x 20" Comfort Support

Video Overview

Open Grid Cushion: Extra Large Gel Seat Cushion Comfort You Can Count On

The Zen Bloks® XL Gel Seat Cushion provides stable, structured comfort for long sitting sessions at home, work or on the road. The 20" x 20" XL surface offers full-seat coverage, and the 2.5-inch extra-thick gel layer pairs cooling airflow with dependable ergonomic support.

The honeycomb gel grid flexes without flattening, while the breathable cover keeps the seat feeling fresh through extended use. This cushion is engineered for users who want firm, consistent support instead of soft or collapsible foam.

Why Choose the XL Open Grid Gel Seat Cushion

Extra-Large Coverage
Designed for office chairs, trucks, gaming setups and home seating.

Dual-Layer Extra Large Gel Seat Cushion Comfort
Cooling honeycomb gel grid with optional high-density foam topper for balanced, natural support.

Ergonomic Sitting Design
Encourages a balanced posture and even weight distribution during long sessions at a desk, driving or gaming.

Cooling Airflow
Open-cell gel grid circulates air and helps maintain a comfortable seating temperature.

Durable Build
Firm gel resists sagging, and the non-slip base keeps the cushion secure on any chair.

Easy to Clean
Comes with a removable, machine-washable cover for everyday use.

Key Benefits

  • Structured gel seat cushion for long sitting
  • Encourages a balanced, natural sitting posture
  • Even weight distribution for more comfortable sessions
  • Cooling honeycomb airflow design
  • Firm and stable; never collapses or feels sponge-like
  • Lightweight and portable with built-in handles
  • Works as a truck driver cushion, office chair upgrade or travel companion
  • Built for long-lasting everyday comfort

Product Details

Dimensions: 20" x 20" x 2.5"
Materials: Cooling TPE gel with optional high-density foam topper
Cover: Removable, washable fabric
Color: Slate Gray
Weight: Approx. 3 lbs
Warranty: 1-Year Limited Warranty
Home Trial: 100-Day Trial (View return policy)

FAQs

Q1: How thick is the extra large gel seat cushion?
It features a 2.5-inch dual-layer build for stable, long-session support.

Q2: Can it be used in cars or trucks?
Yes, the non-slip base keeps it stable on both leather and fabric seats.

Q3: Is it soft or firm?
It’s firm by design with a flexible gel feel to maintain consistent support.

Q4: How do I clean it?
The cover is machine-washable; the gel core can be wiped with mild soap and water.
